title: Code refactoring and changes
message:
Code refactoring and changes

Too many changes to document individually, but:
- Updated libraries (including ExoPlayer)
- Changed how videos are handled
- Made clock and location part of video view
- Added optional progress bar to videos
- Added optional caching mechanism
- Made Settings default activity to make Aerial Dream show up in the
TV Play Store search

title: Major code update
message:
Major code update

So I just realised that I hadn't pushed code for quite a while.
There was a major refactoring of the data layer which also required
changes in the UI layer and I wasn't sure I wanted to go with it until
it was working.

Now that I'm happy with the code it's too hard to go through the changes
and document them properly, so I'm just going to dump it and hope
nobody notices/cares.

title: Improvements
message:
Improvements

- Implement infinite video loop
- Move all logic to custom view
- Add test activity to simplify development
